msg: remove trailing \n from MP_TRACE output because modperl_trace appends a \n by itself

author: stevehay
msg: add emacs mode line (-*-) to ModPerl-Registry/t/*

author: stevehay
msg: add emacs local vars to Perl files. This is done by adding
a "-*- mode: ..." line either as the second line after shebang (#!...)
This way the __DATA__ section is untouched.
add emacs local vars to Perl files in t/.../*.t. This is done by adding
a "-*- mode: ..." line either as the second line after shebang (#!...)
This way the __DATA__ section is untouched.
